attributes.action: The UK received confirmation they can alone revoke Article 50. Revoke it now.
attributes.additional_details:
Sky Customers poll conducted on 11 December 2018 on Brexit shows 55% to remain in the EU against 45% to leave the EU.

700,000 March for a people's vote against a few thousand to support leaving the EU.
attributes.background:
On the 10th of December 2018, the ECJ ruled that the UK can unilaterally revoke article 50. There are now huge evidences that a majority of the British People want to remain in the EU.
We petition for the Parliament to revoke article 50 before the 29 March 2019 and keep the UK in the EU.
